Verses: 1 kiristhu Yesuvinimiththam Kattappattavanaayirukkira Pavulum, Sagodharanaagiya Theemoththeyum, Engalukkup Piriyamullavanum Udanvelaiyaalumaayirukkira Pilemonukkum,
2 piriyamulla Appiyaalukkum Engal Udan Porchsevaganaagiya Arkkippuvukkum, Ummudaiya Veettile Koodivarugira Sabaikkum Ezhudhugiradhaavadhu:
3 nammudaiya Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanaalum, Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvinaalum, Ungalukkuk Kirubaiyum Samaadhaanamum Undaavadhaaga.
4 karththaraagiya Yesuvinidaththilum, Ellaap Parisuththavaangalidaththilum Ummudaiya Anbaiyum Ummudaiya Visuvaasaththaiyum Naan Kelvippattu,
5 en Jebangalil Ummai Ninaiththu, Eppozhudhum En Dhevanukku Sthoththiranjseydhu,
6 ungalilulla Sagala Nanmaigalum Theriyappadugiradhinaale Ummudaiya Visuvaasaththin Anniyonniyam Kiristhu Yesuvukkaagap Bayanpadavendumendru Vendudhal Seygiren.
7 sagodharane, Parisuththavaangaludaiya Ullangal Ummaale Ilaippaarinapadiyaal, Ummudaiya Anbinaale Migundha Sandhoshamum Aarudhalum Adaindhirukkirom.
8 aagaiyaal, Pavulaagiya Naan Mudhirvayadhullavanaagavum, Yesukiristhuvinimiththam Ippozhudhu Kattappattavanaagavum Irukkirapadiyaal,
9 neer Seyyaththakkadhai Umakkuk Kattalaiyidumpadikkuk Kiristhuvukkul Naan Thuniyaththakkavanaayirundhaalum, Appadichseyyaamal, Anbinimiththam Mandraadugiren.
10 ennavendraal, Kattappattirukkaiyil Naan Petra En Maganaagiya Onesimukkaaga Ummai Mandraadugiren.
11 munne Avan Umakkup Pirayojanamillaadhavan, Ippozhudho Umakkum Enakkum Pirayojanamullavan.
12 avanai Naan Ummidaththirku Anuppugiren, En Ullampolirukkira Avanai Neer Etrukkollum.
13 suviseshaththinimiththam Kattappattirukkira Enakku Oozhiyanseyyumpadi Umakku Badhilaaga Avanai Ennidaththil Vaiththukkollavendumendrirundhen.
14 aanaalum Neer Seyyum Nanmaiyaik Kattaayaththinaalalla, Manappoorvamaaich Cheyyaththakkadhaaga, Naan Ummudaiya Sammadhiyillaamal Ondrum Seyya Enakku Manadhillai.

15 avan Endrendraikkum Ummudaiyavanaayirukkumpadikkum, Inimel Avan Adimaiyaanavanaagavalla, Adimaiyaanavanukku Melaanavanaagavum Piriyamulla Sagodharanaagavumirukkumpadikkum Konjakkaalam Ummaivittup Pirindhuponaanaakkum.
16 enakku Avan Piriyamaana Sagodharanaanaal, Umakku Sareeraththinpadiyeyum Karththarukkum Evvalavu Piriyamullavanaayirukkavendum!
17 aadhalaal, Neer Ennai Ummode Aikkiyamaanavanendru Enninaal, Ennai Etrukkolvadhupola Avanaiyum Etrukkollum.
18 avan Umakku Yaadhoru Aniyaayanseydhadhum, Ummidaththil Kadanpattadhum Undaanaal, Adhai En Kanakkile Vaiththukkollum.
19 pavulaagiya Naan Idhai En Sondhakkaiyaale Ezhudhinen, Naan Adhai Seluththith Theerppen. Neer Ummaiththaame Enakkuk Kadanaaga Seluththavendumendru Naan Umakku Sollavendiyadhillaiye.
20 aam, Sagodharane, Karththarukkul Ummaale Enakkup Pirayojanamundaagattum; Karththarukkul En Ullaththai Ilaippaarappannum.
21 naan Sollugiradhilum Adhigamaai Seyveerendru Arindhu, Idharku Neer Inanguveerendru Nichchayiththu, Umakku Ezhudhiyirukkiren.
22 melum, Ungal Vinnappangalinaale Naan Ungalukku Anukkiragikkappaduvenendru Nambiyirukkirapadiyaal, Naan Irukkumpadikku Oridaththai Enakkaaga Aayaththampannum.
23 kiristhu Yesuvinimiththam Ennodekoodak Kaavalil Vaikkappattirukkira Eppaappiraavum,
24 en Udanvelaiyaatkalaagiya Maarkuvum, Arisdharkkum, Themaavum, Lookkaavum Umakku Vaazhththudhal Sollugiraargal.
25 nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvinudaiya Kirubai Ungal Aaviyudanekooda Iruppadhaaga. Aamen.
